Name: Tiki Margarita
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A simple three-imgrediet almond twist on the classic Margarita.
History: Created in 2005 by Crispin Somerville and Jasper Eyears at Bar Tiki, Mexico City. See: Margarita cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Tiki Margarita contains 183 calories
